author: Neuro Assassin
install_msg:
Thank you for downloading this cog.  Please follow the instructions on the repo to get started.
WARNING: This cog/webserver is in alpha status.  This means that is has a chance to break your bot (however unlikely), and is not officially released.  If you do not like this, please uninstall now.
name: dashboard
short: Interact with your bot through a web dashboard.
description: Control your bot through a web dashboard, allowing people to run commands (with permissions checked) straight from an easy-to-use dashboard.
